challenges.title: Create visual balance using the text-align property
description: The text-align property in CSS is used to specify the alignment of text in an element. The most used values are left, right, center or justify.
Align the h5 element to the right.
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
Google was founded by Larry Page and Sergey Brin while they were Ph.D. students at Stanford University.
tests: assert($("h3").css('text-align') == 'center', 'message: Your h3 tag should be centered.');
assert($("p").css('text-align') == 'justify', 'message: Your p tag should be justified.');
assert($("h5").css('text-align') == 'right', 'message: Your h5 element should be aligned to the right.');
